mapper.select: select * from lecture where lec_code in (select oc_code from open_class where oc_pro_code=#{value})

select oc_code,oc_year,oc_semester,oc_max,oc_part,oc_is_close,oc_close_reason,u.name as oc_pro_code,oc_class_room, oc_targetlevel,oc_schedule,s.name,s.reco_score,s.isu,s.dept_code,d.col_code from subject s, open_class o, department d, users u where o.oc_pro_code=u.id AND s.code=oc_code AND s.dept_code=d.dept_code
mapper.update: update open_class set oc_part=(oc_part+1) where oc_part < oc_max AND oc_code=#{lec_code}
update open_class set oc_part=(oc_part-1) where oc_code=#{lec_code}
